document.full_text: at sunday night's olivier awards, britain's equivalent to the tony awards, the society of london theater gave three prizes to 'legally blonde, the musical,' but none to andrew lloyd webber.
document.title: arts, briefly: olivier awards bypass andrew lloyd webber
lines_and_colors: at sunday night's olivier awards, britain's equivalent to the tony awards, the society of london theater gave three prizes to 'legally blonde, the musical,' but none to andrew lloyd webber.
